reviewsJson.markdown:
**VAPE TRAIN STRAWBERRY JAM**

**DISCLAIMER: These are my personal notes that I am sharing with the community & all palates are different.**

**SETUP:** Tobhino RDA N80 3x28G 38G Alien 2.5mm 0.25 Ohms 45 Watts

**Testing Info:** Steeped 14 days, Tested freshly mixed and after 14 days Mixed @ 4% 70/30

**VT'S DESCRIPTION:** "A sweet jelly strawberry jam flavour that will add the finishing touch to any e-liquid recipe that requires an authentic tasting strawberry jam. This flavour can be used in multiple recipes from bakery such as jam filled donuts to PBSJ breads and many more. As a sweet strawberry this could also aid with dairy/ slushy and even ice- cream eliquid recipes." 

**NOTES:** Tested on back of hand after mixing it tasted like a strawberry hard candy.  After it steeped for 2 weeks I tried it again. It was still very candy like, but kind of has the mouthfeel of a jam or jelly. It really reminds me of the Brach's Strawberry Bon Bons candy with the chewy center. It really seems to coat the tongue the flavor sticks around for a while after you vape it. At times I felt like I was getting some ws-23 like coolness on the tail end of the exhale, but it was present through the testing. This is worth picking up if you are into strawberry candy vapes. I wouldn't call or use this as jam in my opinion though.

**Pairings:** Candies, Creams, & Bakeries
reviewsJson.author: ebc88
reviewsJson.title: Strawberry Jam
